name: water-futures-battle
summary: Python project for the Battle of the Water Futures, originally developed to be hosted at WDSA/CCWI 2026 conference, May 18-21, Paphos, Cyprus.
maintainer: Dennis Zanutto, André Artelt, Christos Michalopoulos
author: Dennis Zanutto, Christos Michalopoulos, Lydia Tsiami, André Artelt, Jasmin Brandt, Stelios Vrachimis, Stefano Alvisi, Valentina Marsili, Filippo Mazzoni, Panagiotis Samartzis, Demetrios Eliades
